Name: Rue
About the game: State: The game is currently in Alpha and under active development. Some polish and features are missing, but feel free to enjoy the game until those are done. A card game where all the players are sitting around a table. A rose appears on the table that moves around. The aim of the game is for each player to have the rose in front of them at the end of the round. Each player can use cards that influence the roseâ€™s movement.
